name: Hato!
description:
-Description-

Hato is a special cat, he doesn't have his front paws to protect himself, so his only weapon against his enemies is his magic hat!. Increase the size of the hat indefinitely to destroy all dangers along the way.

-Controls-

  • [WASD] Move
  • [Space] Jump
  • [E] Wear hat
  • [Q] Delete hat
  • [Left mouse button] Attack with hat
  • [Right mouse button] Create hat
  • [R] Restart from last checkpoint
  • [Esc] Main menu
